summary: The snow accumulation on Campfire tents will use the Better Dynamic Snow shader instead of the fugly vanilla white paint effect.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]WHAT IT DOES[/size][/b]
Campfire tents support snow accumulation when it ... um ... snows. Now instead of the fugly vanilla white paint effect, it will use the Better Dynamic Snow shader.

Yep, that's all this does. Shocked no one else has done this (I don't think?)


[size=4][b]REQUIREMENTS[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798?]Campfire[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11]Better Dynamic Snow[/url]﻿ (see the "Ruffled Feather" miscellaneous file)
[/list]
author: Rusey
